title: Recent posts URL
content:
Hello everyone,

Pardon me for asking this silly question, but I as far as I can remember I used to visit a URL where I could easily view a list of the latest Typophile forum posts just like in a feed reader. Somehow I suddenly forgot URL, can anyone tell me what is it?

Thank you.
author: mk2

comments.content:
This?  
 [http://typophile.com/tracker](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018110932/http:/typophile.com/tracker "http://typophile.com/tracker")

Makes a great bookmark. I keep forgetting the address too. :-)

If you're wanting to track Typophile in a feed reader, there are a few other alternatives as well:

[http://typophile.com/rss](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018110932/http:/typophile.com/rss "http://typophile.com/rss") - Latest posts

[http://typophile.com/crss](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018110932/http:/typophile.com/crss "http://typophile.com/crss") - Latest comments (same as Tracker)

More forum-specific feeds here: [http://typophile.com/feeds](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018110932/http:/typophile.com/feeds "http://typophile.com/feeds")
